attributes.action: Politicians to face criminal charges for misleading and lying to the public.
attributes.additional_details: Our political elite have far to long been unaccountable for their actions and seemingly, somehow, above the law. Post BREXIT this must change and anyone elected to a position of power within the British government, seen abusing such position, will face criminal charges and a prison sentence.
attributes.background:
Politicians misrepresenting facts or outright lying to the public.
Politicians abusing the expenses system.
Politicians putting personal and corporate gain ahead of public interest.
Politicians effectively destabilising the British government through lack of planning and/or poor decision making.
